text: Alberto Lleras Camargo (3 July 1906 – 4 January 1990) was a Colombian journalist and politician. He was the 20th President of Colombia (1958–1962), and the 1st Secretary General of the Organization of American States (1948–1954). ==References== Category:1906 births Category:1990 deaths Category:Presidents of Colombia Category:Secretaries General of the Organization of American States Category:Politicians from Bogotá Category:Colombian journalists Category:Writers from Bogotá
title: Alberto Lleras Camargo
